testcase.name: Verify that user is able to add customer details and pay bill
testcase.system-out: Given I access the url and open the browser.................................passed When I verify that the title of the page matches............................passed Then I click on Add Customer Link...........................................passed And I should see the customer portal page...................................passed And I should be able to fill up customer details............................passed And I should see the customer details.......................................passed And I close the browser.....................................................passed
